title: Rename header title to “Simple Solitaire” and center card layout

requirements.text: Update the top header title on the Solitaire page to read exactly "Simple Solitaire" and leave all other existing text unchanged.

quotes: I would like the Top title to read as Simple Solitaire, all other text to remain the same.

acceptanceCriteria: On the main Solitaire page header, the large centered title text displays "Simple Solitaire".
No other user-facing text strings are changed (e.g., footer text, empty pile placeholders, button labels, dialogs).

requirements.text: Center the card layout (top row: stock/waste/foundations; and tableau row) horizontally within the page across responsive breakpoints, without breaking drag-and-drop interactions or causing horizontal overflow on typical viewport widths.

quotes: Regarding format, can the cards be centered in the web page without causing issues?

acceptanceCriteria: On desktop and mobile widths, the top row of piles and the tableau piles are visually centered within the main content area (not left-aligned on larger screens).
Drag-and-drop still functions correctly for tableau and foundation drop targets after the layout change.
The layout remains responsive: piles can wrap to new lines as needed and no new persistent horizontal scrollbar is introduced on common screen sizes.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui or any paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Keep the application backend unchanged (no Motoko changes required).
nonGoals: Do not change any other copy besides the top header title text.
Do not redesign the game, add new controls, or change game rules/logic.
